channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why AI shouldn’t entirely decide promotions and raises—and where the human touch matters
item.description: At our Fortune Global Forum, economics and geopolitical tensions were hot topics, but the future of the workforce and workplace also came up in many c...

item.title: SM Energy is acquiring Civitas in $13 billion oil and gas merger of near equals in the Permian Basin
item.description: The merger is the biggest oil and gas deal in months as the U.S. industry continues to consolidate.

item.title: Trump says he ‘won’t be extorted’ as the shutdown is about to become the longest ever—and millions could soon lose food aid
item.description: As the shutdown drags on, the White House is leaning into online trolling with fake MySpace pages and memes.

item.title: This ETF is handily beating the S&P 500—and analysts say it could be one of the big winners of the AI boom
item.description: Analysts at Ned Davis Research recommend the fund as an "Overweight" investment.

item.title: Goldman Sachs CEO says AI-induced growth offers a ‘path out’ of America’s $38 trillion debt crisis
item.description: "The path out is a growth path," Solomon said. "The difference between compounding growth of 3% and 2% is monstrous in terms of dealing with this issu...
